### 2. Summary

-   This dataset contains 10,000 actual lending records on the peer-to-peer lending         platform, Lending Club (https://www.lendingclub.com/), from 2017 to 2018.
-   Lending Club offers loans to individual borrowers and collects aggregate money from     individual investors so smaller lending can offset the risks associated with any        particular loan.
